00070 static void mdt_identity_entry_init(struct upcall_cache_entry *entry,
00071                                     void *unused)
00072 {
00073         entry->u.identity.mi_uc_entry = entry;
00074 }
00075 
00076 static void mdt_identity_entry_free(struct upcall_cache *cache,
00077                                     struct upcall_cache_entry *entry)
00078 {
00079         struct md_identity *identity = &entry->u.identity;
00080 
00081         if (identity->mi_ginfo) {
00082                 put_group_info(identity->mi_ginfo);
00083                 identity->mi_ginfo = NULL;
00084         }
00085 
00086         if (identity->mi_nperms) {
00087                 LASSERT(identity->mi_perms);
00088                 OBD_FREE(identity->mi_perms,
00089                          identity->mi_nperms * sizeof(struct md_perm));
00090                 identity->mi_nperms = 0;
00091         }
00092 }
00093 
00094 static int mdt_identity_do_upcall(struct upcall_cache *cache,
00095                                   struct upcall_cache_entry *entry)
00096 {
00097         char keystr[16];
00098         char *argv[] = {
00099                   [0] = cache->uc_upcall,
00100                   [1] = cache->uc_name,
00101                   [2] = keystr,
00102                   [3] = NULL
00103         };
00104         char *envp[] = {
00105                   [0] = "HOME=/",
00106                   [1] = "PATH=/sbin:/usr/sbin",
00107                   [2] = NULL
00108         };
00109         struct timeval start, end;
00110         int rc;
00111         ENTRY;
00112 
00113         /* There is race condition:
00114          * "uc_upcall" was changed just after "is_identity_get_disabled" check.
00115          */
00116         read_lock(&cache->uc_upcall_rwlock);
00117         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "The upcall is: '%s'\n", cache->uc_upcall);
00118 
00119         if (unlikely(!strcmp(cache->uc_upcall, "NONE"))) {
00120                 CERROR("no upcall set\n");
00121                 GOTO(out, rc = -EREMCHG);
00122         }
00123 
00124         argv[0] = cache->uc_upcall;
00125         snprintf(keystr, sizeof(keystr), LPU64, entry->ue_key);
00126 
00127         do_gettimeofday(&start);
00128         rc = call_usermodehelper(argv[0], argv, envp, UMH_WAIT_EXEC);
00129         do_gettimeofday(&end);
00130         if (rc < 0) {
00131                 CERROR("%s: error invoking upcall %s %s %s: rc %d; "
00132                        "check /proc/fs/lustre/mdt/%s/identity_upcall, "
00133                        "time %ldus\n",
00134                        cache->uc_name, argv[0], argv[1], argv[2], rc,
00135                        cache->uc_name, cfs_timeval_sub(&end, &start, NULL));
00136         } else {
00137                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: invoked upcall %s %s %s, time %ldus\n",
00138                        cache->uc_name, argv[0], argv[1], argv[2],
00139                        cfs_timeval_sub(&end, &start, NULL));
00140                 rc = 0;
00141         }
00142         EXIT;
00143 out:
00144         read_unlock(&cache->uc_upcall_rwlock);
00145         return rc;
00146 }
00147 
00148 static int mdt_identity_parse_downcall(struct upcall_cache *cache,
00149                                        struct upcall_cache_entry *entry,
00150                                        void *args)
00151 {
00152         struct md_identity *identity = &entry->u.identity;
00153         struct identity_downcall_data *data = args;
00154         struct group_info *ginfo = NULL;
00155         struct md_perm *perms = NULL;
00156         int size, i;
00157         ENTRY;
00158 
00159         LASSERT(data);
00160         if (data->idd_ngroups > NGROUPS_MAX)
00161                 RETURN(-E2BIG);
00162 
00163         if (data->idd_ngroups > 0) {
00164                 ginfo = groups_alloc(data->idd_ngroups);
00165                 if (!ginfo) {
00166                         CERROR("failed to alloc %d groups\n", data->idd_ngroups);
00167                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00168                 }
00169 
00170                 lustre_groups_from_list(ginfo, data->idd_groups);
00171                 lustre_groups_sort(ginfo);
00172         }
00173 
00174         if (data->idd_nperms) {
00175                 size = data->idd_nperms * sizeof(*perms);
00176                 OBD_ALLOC(perms, size);
00177                 if (!perms) {
00178                         CERROR("failed to alloc %d permissions\n",
00179                                data->idd_nperms);
00180                         if (ginfo != NULL)
00181                                 put_group_info(ginfo);
00182                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00183                 }
00184 
00185                 for (i = 0; i < data->idd_nperms; i++) {
00186                         perms[i].mp_nid = data->idd_perms[i].pdd_nid;
00187                         perms[i].mp_perm = data->idd_perms[i].pdd_perm;
00188                 }
00189         }
00190 
00191         identity->mi_uid = data->idd_uid;
00192         identity->mi_gid = data->idd_gid;
00193         identity->mi_ginfo = ginfo;
00194         identity->mi_nperms = data->idd_nperms;
00195         identity->mi_perms = perms;
00196 
00197         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "parse mdt identity@%p: %d:%d, ngroups %u, nperms %u\n",
00198                identity, identity->mi_uid, identity->mi_gid,
00199                data->idd_ngroups, data->idd_nperms);
00200 
00201         RETURN(0);
00202 }
00203 
00204 struct md_identity *mdt_identity_get(struct upcall_cache *cache, __u32 uid)
00205 {
00206         struct upcall_cache_entry *entry;
00207 
00208         if (!cache)
00209                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
00210 
00211         entry = upcall_cache_get_entry(cache, (__u64)uid, NULL);
00212         if (IS_ERR(entry))
00213                 return ERR_PTR(PTR_ERR(entry));
00214         else if (unlikely(!entry))
00215                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
00216         else
00217                 return &entry->u.identity;
00218 }
00219 
00220 void mdt_identity_put(struct upcall_cache *cache, struct md_identity *identity)
00221 {
00222         if (!cache)
00223                 return;
00224 
00225         LASSERT(identity);
00226         upcall_cache_put_entry(cache, identity->mi_uc_entry);
00227 }
00228 
00229 struct upcall_cache_ops mdt_identity_upcall_cache_ops = {
00230         .init_entry     = mdt_identity_entry_init,
00231         .free_entry     = mdt_identity_entry_free,
00232         .do_upcall      = mdt_identity_do_upcall,
00233         .parse_downcall = mdt_identity_parse_downcall,
00234 };
00235 
00236 void mdt_flush_identity(struct upcall_cache *cache, int uid)
00237 {
00238         if (uid < 0)
00239                 upcall_cache_flush_idle(cache);
00240         else
00241                 upcall_cache_flush_one(cache, (__u64)uid, NULL);
00242 }
00243 
00244 /*
00245  * If there is LNET_NID_ANY in perm[i].mp_nid,
00246  * it must be perm[0].mp_nid, and act as default perm.
00247  */
00248 __u32 mdt_identity_get_perm(struct md_identity *identity,
00249                             __u32 is_rmtclient, lnet_nid_t nid)
00250 {
00251         struct md_perm *perm;
00252         int i;
00253 
00254         if (!identity) {
00255                 LASSERT(is_rmtclient == 0);
00256                 return CFS_SETGRP_PERM;
00257         }
00258 
00259         perm = identity->mi_perms;
00260         /* check exactly matched nid first */
00261         for (i = identity->mi_nperms - 1; i > 0; i--) {
00262                 if (perm[i].mp_nid != nid)
00263                         continue;
00264                 return perm[i].mp_perm;
00265         }
00266 
00267         /* check LNET_NID_ANY then */
00268         if ((identity->mi_nperms > 0) &&
00269             ((perm[0].mp_nid == nid) || (perm[0].mp_nid == LNET_NID_ANY)))
00270                 return perm[0].mp_perm;
00271 
00272         /* return default last */
00273         return is_rmtclient ? 0 : CFS_SETGRP_PERM;
00274 }
00275 
00276 int mdt_pack_remote_perm(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
00277                          void *buf)
00278 {
00279         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred_check(info);
00280         struct md_object        *next = mdt_object_child(o);
00281         struct mdt_remote_perm  *perm = buf;
00282 
00283         ENTRY;
00284 
00285         /* remote client request always pack ptlrpc_user_desc! */
00286         LASSERT(perm);
00287 
00288         if (!exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp))
00289                 RETURN(-EBADE);
00290 
00291         if (uc == NULL)
00292                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00293 
00294         perm->rp_uid = uc->uc_o_uid;
00295         perm->rp_gid = uc->uc_o_gid;
00296         perm->rp_fsuid = uc->uc_o_fsuid;
00297         perm->rp_fsgid = uc->uc_o_fsgid;
00298 
00299         perm->rp_access_perm = 0;
00300         if (mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, next, NULL, MAY_READ) == 0)
00301                 perm->rp_access_perm |= MAY_READ;
00302         if (mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, next, NULL, MAY_WRITE) == 0)
00303                 perm->rp_access_perm |= MAY_WRITE;
00304         if (mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, next, NULL, MAY_EXEC) == 0)
00305                 perm->rp_access_perm |= MAY_EXEC;
00306 
00307         RETURN(0);
00308 }
